About the Company: DRA Consultants Pvt Ltd is central Indias one of the leading Engineering consultancy firm. They have been established in 1990. They are known for its quality work, reliability, technical solutions & core values among its clients. They have providedconsultancy services to various municipal water supply projects, Urban infrastructure projects, energy management & conservation programes & masteredin industrial utility designs. They are located in Nagpur, India.
